subject: Re: [R] permutation operator
body:
Jiao Yang wrote:
> Dear all,
>
> I was wondering whether R has an operator or function that randomly permutes the element of a vector.  
>
>   
Yes, it does.














Oh, you wanted to know what it is called, too?

sample(x)

R-help@stat.math.ethz.ch mailing list
https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-help
PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
